reviews.text:
New, apparently, and amazing!!!

Will be back!

Excellent Happy Hour specials!
Food and drinks were fantastic. Very chill environment. Humberto was our server and he makes the place shine. Will definitely be back.
I found them on instagram and tried later, I liked the tostadas.
Fantastic service
Great place ! Good happy hour deals. Delicious.
Loved the food, been there twice already and we are going back soon! The service is great and the place look really nice.
Legit mexican food! The food is amazing and the servers are all super nice. Specially recommend the michelada to drink, queso fundido for an appetizer and the carnitas tacos.
Buen ambiente los fines de semana

La Contact is such a gem! ‚ú® It‚Äôs a fresh concept Mexican restaurant that feels so warm and home-like the second you walk in. Sometimes they even have live music, which makes it even more special.
Roberto is hands down the most hospitable person I‚Äôve ever met ‚Äî he made the whole experience feel like we were guests in his home. We had so much fun!
And the food‚Ä¶ wow. We tried guacamole, shrimp tacos, salmon, another shrimp dish, and honestly every single thing was incredible. I couldn‚Äôt even pick a favorite because it was all so delicious. And the non alcoholic margaritas are amazing!!!
Highly recommend ‚Äî we‚Äôre already planning to come back! üåÆüíÉ
I‚Äôm from Mexico City and can honestly say their food is great! We went on Independence Day and the live music and atmosphere was great!
Omg. This is the best Mexican food in the neighborhood. Best fish taco I‚Äôve had. Great happy hour special. Highly recommend!

AMAZING FOOD WOW !!! Loved the salmon al pastor it‚Äôs a must , love the music and the drinks as well and the fish tacos are so delicious and they use  handmade tortillas . 100% recommend and will be back to try more menu items.

The service quality here was absolutely phenomenal as was the quality of food and drinks. This is certainly not one of those run-of-the-mill Mexican restaurants. The quality of food is far superior and we genuinely look forward to coming back.
Best nachos I've ever had and and the staff was super cool,  happy friendly and made me wanna brunch all day. I had to have more  than 1 drink because it's so smooth. I highly recommend

Last week, me and my girlfriend couldn‚Äôt choose a place to eat. Luckily, we randomly struck upon La Contenta Greenpoint and was blown away. From their appetizers like the nachos( my personal favorite) and ceviche to their main courses like the enchiladas suizas, every dish was delicious. We‚Äôre definitely coming back here!

this is such a cute new restaurant to have in Greenpoint. Service was so friendly and wonderful. They even brought us a free dessert! Even gave us a tequila sample lol. Food was delicious and I am excited to go back again very soon. definitely try the Chilaquiles!
Extremely good - I‚Äôm so happy they are in the neighborhood

Ever since I heard they opened up a location in Greenpoint, my curiosity got the best of me. Me and my boyfriend decided to check it out. We ordered the nachos (best nachos I‚Äôve had) we always get them. For drinks we ordered the cantarito al pastor - So good! Definitely recommend stopping by, decor/ambiance was great. Also, love the idea of the garden in the back!
Lovely people and amazing location! Cant wait to return.

I was already pretty excited to check out this new spot but La Contenta truly blew my expectations out of the water. Our cocktails were awesome and the guac was very good but the tacos were to die for. The pescado tacos were packed with flavor and the steak tacos were an absolute show-stealer, just perfectly cooked meat and a wonderful sauce. The service was also warm and fast. Excited to have this gem in the neighborhood!
That mole + drinks where such an experience ü§§üíï

When I heard they opened a Greenpoint location, I had to go. The LES location was my first Mexican food experience in New York and has always been my favorite Mexican food in NYC. I recommend the carne asada tacos and the Oaxaca Express cocktail

A great new addition to the neighborhood with two very successful existing locations in the west village and lower east side. The food, drinks, and service were all top notch! So excited that this is here!
Awesome food, some of the best tacos I‚Äôve ever had!! Delicious drinks and wonderful staff. Highly recommend!

Food amazing
Staff even better 10 ‚≠ê
Very nice place, excellent customer service. Food is delicious. Is a good option for the whole family.
